message: Starting engineering next month. Any tips from current students on managing the workload and staying on top of assignments?
Looking to form a study group for Organic Chem 2. Meeting twice a week, preferably evenings. Anyone interested?
What apps do you use to stay organized? I'm looking for something better than just basic calendars and to-do lists.
Planning a casual meet-up for international students this Saturday at the campus caf√©. Everyone's welcome!
Just finished my co-op at a tech startup. Happy to answer questions about applications, interviews, and what to expect!
For those applying to grad school next year, when did you start preparing? Feeling overwhelmed with GRE, letters, and statements.
Looking for part-time work that won't interfere too much with studies. What campus jobs have you found most flexible?
Reminder that our campus has free counseling services. Don't hesitate to reach out if you're feeling overwhelmed. You're not alone!
